QU/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
I sell 10 tickets per 1 time.
Beside it is impossible to have tickets over 100 pieces.
The price of tickets is...
HP Ticket : 1000 zenys
SP Ticket : 2500 zenys
QU/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
I sell 10 tickets per 1 time.
Beside it is impossible to have tickets over 100 pieces.
The price of tickets is...
HP Ticket : 1000 zenys
SP Ticket : 2500 zenys

Qk/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
So would you like to buy my ticket?
Why don't you choose a ticket if you want to buy?
Qk/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
So would you like to buy my ticket?
Why don't you choose a ticket if you want to buy?

Rk/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
You have already got enough tickets.
No need to get more.
Rk/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
You have already got enough tickets.
No need to get more.

R0/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
Yes! You chose tickets which will cure your physical injury.
If you have this, My assistant will save you any time
in a urgent situation.
R0/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
Yes! You chose tickets which will cure your physical injury.
If you have this, My assistant will save you any time
in a urgent situation.

SE/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
Hey.
You should bring money to buy tickets.
SE/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
Hey.
You should bring money to buy tickets.

SU/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
Yes! You chose tickets which will clear up your sick spirit.
If you have this, My assistant will save you any time
in a urgent situation.
SU/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
Yes! You chose tickets which will clear up your sick spirit.
If you have this, My assistant will save you any time
in a urgent situation.

Sk/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
Of course, I don't push you.
You may come only when you want to buy.
Sk/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
Of course, I don't push you.
You may come only when you want to buy.

S0/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
Hey! buddy...
You look so healthy now.
But You may get injured
while traveling around out of town.
S0/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
Hey! buddy...
You look so healthy now.
But You may get injured
while traveling around out of town.

TE/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
In many places speially my assistants are out to support.
If you are injured , You will be helped by them.
Of course, it is no problem for them to cure any deep wounds.
TE/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
In many places speially my assistants are out to support.
If you are injured , You will be helped by them.
Of course, it is no problem for them to cure any deep wounds.

TU/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
However...
We also need to live.
So this service is not free.
To get their help, you must have
tickets which you can only buy from me.
TU/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
However...
We also need to live.
So this service is not free.
To get their help, you must have
tickets which you can only buy from me.

Tk/UBQ.en:
[Doctor Special]
So how do you think, Would you buy my tickets?
If you want, please choose the tickets.
Tk/UBQ.pt:
[Doctor Special]
So how do you think, Would you buy my tickets?
If you want, please choose the tickets.

UE/UBQ.en:
[Assistant]
You have tickets of our doctor.
I will recover your body and spirit quickly
with our own special treatment.
What kind of treatment do you want?
UE/UBQ.pt:
[Assistant]
You have tickets of our doctor.
I will recover your body and spirit quickly
with our own special treatment.
What kind of treatment do you want?

U0/UBQ.en:
[Assistant]
Now I am going to cure your wounds
A piece of your tickets will be consumed.
U0/UBQ.pt:
[Assistant]
Now I am going to cure your wounds
A piece of your tickets will be consumed.

Wk/UBQ.en:
[Assistant]
I was dispatched to cure people
Who's suffering with wounds which they got during hunting.
There are too many people want to use our service.
So we sell tickets.

I was dispatched to cure people
